New Records: India scored their highest T20I score in Sri Lanka
Key Match Events: Arshdeep Singh and Axar Patel took two wickets each
India's Suryakumar Yadav scored 58 off 26 balls
Pre-Game Insights: Suryakumar Yadav will be a key player for India
Matheesha Pathirana is expected to play a major role for Sri Lanka
Post-Match Reflections: India take 1-0 lead in the three-T20 match series
India will face Sri Lanka for the second T20 match at the same venue on 28 July
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Pallekele International Cricket Stadium offers a balanced batting track
The monsoon season will make the dew factor significant
Thunderstorms have lashed Kandy, where the match will take place
